name: Houjix
Lore: 'Dejarik creature. These ferocious-looking beasts are gentle, loyal, and often domesticated as guard animals or pets on Kinyen, the Gran homeworld. Incendiary.',
Text: 'During the damage segment of a battle you lost, if you have no cards left that can be forfeited, cancel all remaining battle damage. (Immune to Sense.) OR Cancel Sunsdown.',
